snippet: The amount of solar capacity installed in the United States last year was more than double the 2010 level, but a slowdown may be in the offing for because crucial tax incentives have expired.
abstract: The amount of solar capacity installed in the United States last year was more than double the 2010 level, but a slowdown may be in the offing for because crucial tax incentives have expired.

headline.main: New Solar Panels Blossomed Despite a Tough Year for the Industry
